title: My Portfolio
description: Built a portfolio website using React and Integrated with a LLM Chat bot that can answer questions related to my profile.

title: Research.ai
description: A bot that can generate articles with a proper format using Crewai, Serper API and GPT-4. given a topic.

title: Type SQL
description: This project is a SQL query generator that can generate SQL queries from text along with ER diagrams using CHAT GPT API.

title: Investo
description: This is a stock predicting project where the data is streamed through AWS Kenisis and Forcasted using AWS SageMaker.

title: Ask pdf
description: Developed a pdf processing applicatopn using AWS Bedrock, Langchain , and FAISS to answer qestions from pdfs.

title: Talk Beyond
description: A Message translating app built using Flutter and Google Translate API which is localized over 30+ languages.
